short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly manage all the tabs across different windows with simplicity!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tabby: Your personal tabs manager!
The best and the simple tool to organize opened tabs across different windows quickly. It helps you to quickly switch between different tabs.

If you like it, please leave a review! We read all the reviews ❤

★  What is Tabby ?
A simple and super fast chrome extension that manage tabs across different windows. It helps you to close or open any tab across different windows with just a click.

★  Functionality:

➤ Display all tabs across different windows quickly.
➤ Close any tab in different windows quickly
➤ Open any tab with just a click
➤ Close all the tabs with just a click
➤ Open a new tab with just a click
